description: Try our easy to follow Buttercream Icing Mix recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Icing & frosting,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Strawberry,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Buttercream Icing Mix Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using an electric mixer, beat 150g softened unsalted butter until pale
Gradually add buttercream icing mix and 3 tsp water, beating continuously for 3-5 mins
Spread onto cakes and cupcakes using a spatula or piping bag
